column1: Excited to join my friend @CooneyforMT in Helena today. Hope to see you there. #mtpol #mtnews https://t.co/hAESo1RbSd

Steve Bullock brought Montana commonsense values to the campaign and I’m proud to call him a friend. His track record of creating opportunity in rural America and bridging the partisan divide has made this country stronger.

Honored to join my friend @JoeManchinWV in the Mountain State this evening to talk about the importance of standing up for rural America and focusing on the issues that bring us together. When rural America wins we all win.   It was great to be with you. https://t.co/xsb7UNNhbS

A year ago today the good folks of our great state decided to send a dirt farmer back to the Senate and continue to represent their voice in Washington.   I’m humbled and honored every day to fight for Montana. Thank you. https://t.co/2skL1ME5JQ

Congratulations to Governor-elect @AndyBeshearKY on a hard-fought win. Thanks for focusing on the issues that matter to all Americans  from affordable health care to good-paying jobs. Looking forward to your leadership in Kentucky.
I am proud of my friend @GovernorBullock for continuing to fight against the corrupting influence of dark money in campaigns and government. https://t.co/nuZOD7nWY4
.@GovernorBullock bringing Montana common sense to #DemDebate. He knows how to deliver on promises to expand access to affordable health care.
Wishing my friend @GovernorBullock  good luck at tonight’s debate! 🤙🏻 https://t.co/eEIvceTfOk

Excited that @GovernorBullock qualified for the 2nd debate. He's an important voice for hardworking Americans & I look forward to watching him highlight the issues that matter to Democrats in rural areas & across the country. If you agree send him $1: https://t.co/q7k0xophyf
.@CoryBooker if you're going this route I have some advice. @TheOnion https://t.co/YHw60TdprW

Had a great time at our Rural Roundtable in Des Moines today talking about agriculture economic opportunity education infrastructure and rural health care. Thank you to former @usda Sec. Vilsack & fellow farmer former Lt Gov & @FocusRural Chair @pattyforiowa for joining! https://t.co/I3SB9imMT5

“@MTDems registered more than 8000 new voters made more than 700k phone calls and knocked more than half a million doors. And tonight I stand here as your third term Senator because of you!” #MansfieldMetcalf #mtpol https://t.co/EMcMfRLYfc

Had a great time with Governor @LauraKellyKS & the @KansasDems tonight talking about how to bring commonsense back to Washington and stand up for rural America! #WashingtonDays https://t.co/HFgTBBaER9
